verses.verse: Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6030>said<s%> <S%H559><s%> to <S%H347>Job,<s%>
"Will the <S%H3250>faultfinder<s%> <S%H7378>contend<s%> with the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%>? Let him who <S%H3198>reproves<s%> <S%H433>God<s%> <S%H6030>answer<s%> it."
Then <S%H347>Job<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%>
<S%H2005>"Behold,<s%> I am <S%H7043>insignificant;<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> can I <S%H7725>reply<s%> to Thee? I <S%H7760>lay<s%> my <S%H3027>hand<s%> on my <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>
<S%H259>"Once<s%> I have <S%H1696>spoken,<s%> and I will not <S%H6030>answer;<s%> Even <S%H8147>twice,<s%> and I will <S%H3254>add<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> more."
Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H347>Job<s%> out of the <S%H9370>storm,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%>
<S%H4994>"Now<s%> <S%H247>gird<s%> up your <S%H2504>loins<s%> like a <S%H1397>man;<s%> I will <S%H7592>ask<s%> you, and you <S%H3045>instruct<s%> Me.
"Will you <S%H637>really<s%> <S%H6565>annul<s%> My <S%H4941>judgment<s%>? Will you <S%H7561>condemn<s%> Me that you may be <S%H6663>justified<s%>?
<S%H518>"Or<s%> do you have an <S%H2220>arm<s%> like <S%H410>God,<s%> And can you <S%H7481>thunder<s%> with a <S%H6963>voice<s%> <S%H3644>like<s%> His?
<S%H5710>"Adorn<s%> <S%H5710>yourself<s%> with <S%H1347>eminence<s%> and <S%H1363>dignity;<s%> And <S%H3847>clothe<s%> <S%H3847>yourself<s%> with <S%H1935>honor<s%> and <S%H1926>majesty.<s%>

<S%H6327>"Pour<s%> out the <S%H5678>overflowings<s%> of your <S%H639>anger;<s%> And <S%H7200>look<s%> on <S%H3605>everyone<s%> <S%H1343>who<s%> is <S%H1343>proud,<s%> and <S%H8213>make<s%> him <S%H8213>low.<s%>

<S%H7200>"Look<s%> on <S%H3605>everyone<s%> <S%H1343>who<s%> is <S%H1343>proud,<s%> [and] <S%H3665>humble<s%> him; And <S%H1915>tread<s%> <S%H1915>down<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H8478>where<s%> they <S%H8478>stand.<s%>
<S%H2934>"Hide<s%> them in the <S%H6083>dust<s%> <S%H3162>together;<s%> <S%H2280>Bind<s%> them in the <S%H2934>hidden<s%> [place.]
"Then I will <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H3034>confess<s%> to you, That your own <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> can <S%H3467>save<s%> you.
<S%H2009>"Behold<s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> <S%H930>Behemoth,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6213>made<s%> as <S%H5973>well<s%> as you; He <S%H398>eats<s%> <S%H2682>grass<s%> like an <S%H1241>ox.<s%>
<S%H2009>"Behold<s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> his <S%H3581>strength<s%> in his <S%H4975>loins,<s%> And his <S%H202>power<s%> in the <S%H8306>muscles<s%> of his <S%H990>belly.<s%>
"He <S%H9156>bends<s%> his <S%H2180>tail<s%> <S%H3644>like<s%> a <S%H730>cedar;<s%> The <S%H1517>sinews<s%> of his <S%H6344>thighs<s%> are <S%H8276>knit<s%> <S%H8276>together.<s%>
"His <S%H6106>bones<s%> are <S%H650>tubes<s%> of <S%H5154>bronze;<s%> His <S%H1634>limbs<s%> are like <S%H4300>bars<s%> of <S%H1270>iron.<s%>
"He is the <S%H7225>first<s%> of the <S%H1870>ways<s%> of <S%H410>God;<s%> Let his <S%H6213>maker<s%> <S%H5066>bring<s%> <S%H5066>near<s%> his <S%H2719>sword.<s%>
<S%H5608>"Surely<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> <S%H5375>bring<s%> him <S%H944>food,<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H9130>beasts<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> <S%H7832>play<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>
<S%H8478>"Under<s%> the <S%H6628>lotus<s%> <S%H6628>plants<s%> he <S%H7901>lies<s%> <S%H7901>down,<s%> In the <S%H5643>covert<s%> of the <S%H7070>reeds<s%> and the <S%H1207>marsh.<s%>
"The <S%H6628>lotus<s%> <S%H6628>plants<s%> <S%H5526>cover<s%> him with <S%H6738>shade;<s%> The <S%H6155>willows<s%> of the <S%H5158>brook<s%> <S%H5437>surround<s%> him.

<S%H2005>"If<s%> a <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H6231>rages,<s%> he is not <S%H2648>alarmed;<s%> He is <S%H982>confident,<s%> <S%H3588>though<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> <S%H1518>rushes<s%> to his <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>
"Can anyone <S%H3947>capture<s%> him when he is on <S%H5869>watch,<s%> With <S%H4170>barbs<s%> can anyone <S%H9344>pierce<s%> [his] <S%H639>nose<s%>?
